metadata.title: 2 and 3-D SCRUM model and results tuned for the northern Gulf of Alaska shelf

creators.name: University of Alaska Fairbanks (UAF), School of Fisheries

metadata.description:
S-coordinate Rutgers University model (Haidvogel), a finite-difference, free-surface model with topography following vertical coordinates.
An NPMR project
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Model to understand the dynamic response of the GOA shelf to a distributed coastal buoyancy influx and downwelling winds in support of NPMR "Process Modeling of the Alaska Coastal Current"

Status: Planned

Maintenance frequency: As Needed
